item.title: CVE-2024-35749|2024-06-10T18:37:56.177Z -- acurax -- under%20construction%20%2F%20maintenance%20mode%20from%20acurax
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in Acurax Under Construction / Maintenance Mode from Acurax allows Authentication Bypass.This issue affects Under Construction / Maintenance Mode from Acurax: from n/a through 2.6.
